content.html: Nothing will have as big an impact on your life (and everyone else’s) in the next 5, 10, 30 years as CLIMATE. Nothing. Climate change is the one thing that will shape all else: health, economy, security, nations, everything. Please think well about who you vote, how you live.
content.value:
Nothing will have as big an impact on your life (and everyone else’s) in the next 5, 10, 30 years as CLIMATE. 

Nothing. Climate change is the one thing that will shape all else: health, economy, security, nations, everything. 

Please think well about who you vote, how you live.
